PackageOracle.name: DA_PRIVATE_CAT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PRIVATE_CAT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.08.824180000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,private_cat_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_cat_nm IN VARCHAR2
,private_cat_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,private_cat_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_private_cat;

body.name: DA_PRIVATE_CAT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PRIVATE_CAT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.08.834019000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,private_cat_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_cat_nm IN VARCHAR2
,private_cat_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_private_cat.add, parms=' || private_cat_cd || '|' || private_cat_nm || '|' || private_cat_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_private_cat a
(
a.private_cat_cd
,a.private_cat_nm
,a.private_cat_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.private_cat_cd
,add.private_cat_nm
,add.private_cat_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_private_cat.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,private_cat_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_private_cat.del, parms=' || private_cat_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_private_cat a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.private_cat_cd = del.private_cat_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_private_cat.del');

END del;

END da_private_cat;
